price: 2. Bato bakanisi ete bakotika bango baloba ete tondimi, mpe bamekama te?
arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتۡرَكُوٓاْ أَن يَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: aḥasiba al-nāsu an yut'rakū an yaqūlū āmannā wahum lā yuf'tanūna
